channel.title: http on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in http on Notes

item.title: CS138-lecture-20210216
item.description: Broadcast can only be based on UDP, because you don’t know where to make a connection. 11 tcp connections are needed in total RTT = round trip time

item.title: CS138-lecture-20210218
item.description: https://media.pearsoncmg.com/aw/ecs_kurose_compnetwork_7/cw/content/interactiveanimations/http-delay-estimation/index.html In piplining, the object requests are “back to back” The proxy server can have a web cache copy so it doesn’t have to request the origin again. Cache hit, the request was cached miss, the request was not cached
